text: Title Introduction to Software Engineering Academic Level Undergraduate Course Owner Department of Computer Science Grading Basis Credit/D/Fail Graded Credits 4 Credits Description Specification, design, validation, evolution and construction of modern software systems, within the context of socially and professionally relevant domains such as ethics, intellectual property, and information security. [3-2-0] Prerequisite: All of CPSC 213, CPSC 221.
